TitleEnglish: Sinbad: The Flying Princess and the Secret Island Part 2
SummaryEnglish: Sinbad and his friends run afoul of a storm while riding on the ship Bahal. Ali sights an island, which the ship heads toward to make repairs. Sinbad and Sana board a dinghy and land on the island. Sana sees a vision of a magical lamp, and Sinbad and the others set out to find it.
Aliases: Sinbad - The Magic Lamp and the Moving Island
Sinbad - The Magical Lamp and the Moving Island
Sinbad: Mahou no Lamp to Ugoku Shima
シンドバッド 魔法のランプと動く島
